channel.title: ExileScape Dev. Team
channel.description:
[b]NO FLAMING[/b] Hallo, Well my little brother joined these forums wanting to code and such...Well he didn't get anywhere instead he ditched it all. So i have decided to continue his work on [u]Exile Sc4p3[/u]
~Forums:~ [url=http://exilescape.co.nr]ExileScape Forums[/url]
~Members:~
[b]Project Managers:[/b]
[ul][li]Mod Robby[/li] [li]Hippyss[/li] [li]open[/li] [li]open[/li][/ul]
[b]Server Coders:[/b]
[ul][li]Mod Robby[/li] [li]I Metal I[/li] [li]Hippyss[/li] [li]Still More open![/li][/ul]
[b]Client coders[/b]
[ul][li]OPEN![/li][/ul]
[b]No-ip Host[/b]
[ul][li]ME![/li][/ul]
~Joining:~
Use this layout [code] [b]Name On forums and server:[/b] [b]Rank:[/b] eg: Jr.Member Sr. Member, ect. [b]Coding XP:[/b] [b]Proof:[/b] [b]Position wanted:[/b] [b]Why I should Accept you:[/b]
[/code]

I want to join…Im on fourms!

Proof: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,143755.0.html Nights Realm

Why I should Accept you: Im good at coding and i can help with ALOT!

i say we put that behind us and pretend it never happend
[/quote][/quote]

item.title: ExileScape Dev. Team
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

[quote=“mod robby, post:19, topic:103123”][quote author=I Metal I link=topic=147636.msg1409525#msg1409525 date=1180687993]

Name On forumsHippyss
Rank: Sr.member
Coding XP:High
Proof:I worked with you on project mojo must i post proof?
Position wanted:Project manager.
Why I should Accept you:I helped on the last project?

Code:
Name On forums and server: I Metal I
Rank: Sr. Member
Coding XP: quite a bit
Proof: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,145402.0.html
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,143898.0.html
Position wanted: Server Coder
Why I should Accept you: im good at coding and this time i promise not to flame

on a personal note i wanna appologize to hippyys because i dont remember if i did or not… i appologized to robby and javaTM even though hell never know cause he was banned for being oblak O.o

Name On forums and server: Teric6? !Duh! look above.
Rank:Sr. Member? Again, look above.
Coding XP: Very much! But i’m also studying batch now.
Proof: Look in the tut section pl0x?
Position wanted: Coder/ Good rank on the forums!
Why I should Accept you: Because you can

All Accepted but you will need to fill an aplication out on the forums too sorry its just because of spammers and such ;D

Note:I Metal I please Don’t be disrespectful or you will be kicked from the team, thanks

Note: i wouldent have been last time if it wasent for javaTM…

Note2:alright will do O.o

Okay lol…BIG QUOTE

yup its a big quote O.o also may i add that the co.nr thing is messed up for me and might be for others… it makes you re signin alot O.o like every page
[/quote]

Lol just make it remember your password then you will just stay logged in[/quote]

aww come on you gonna make me do that one extra click? pfft fine but this wont be the last you hear of it O.o =P

Read full topic
